message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This is a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,500,000, reflecting our commitment to making this opportunity accessible to you. We believe this price offers an excellent value for the quality and benefits the product provides. We look forward to your consideration.

Alice, I appreciate the offer but $1,350,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in this product and am willing to pay $1,250,000. I believe this price reflects a fair value for both of us and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement. Let's see if we can come to a deal.
